text: "Wild is the Wind" is a 1957 song by Johnny Mathis and is the title track to the 1957 movie Wild Is the Wind. It went to number 22 in the United States and was nominated an Academy Award in 1958. It has many covered by Nina Simone, David Bowie and George Michael. ==References== Category:1957 songs Category:Pop songs Category:R&B; songs Category:Johnny Mathis songs Category:David Bowie songs Category:Nina Simone songs Category:George Michael songs
title: Wild Is the Wind (song)
